hostname dev4a
!
version 16.12
!
interface GigabitEthernet0/0
 description <dev3 Gi0/1>
 ip address 10.34.0.41 255.255.255.0
 standby 104 ip 10.34.0.4
 standby 104 priority 105
 standby 104 preempt
 standby 104 track GigabitEthernet0/0
 no shutdown
!
interface GigabitEthernet0/1
 description <dev5 Gi0/0>
 ip address 10.45.0.41 255.255.255.0
 standby 105 ip 10.45.0.4
 standby 105 priority 105
 standby 105 preempt
 standby 105 track GigabitEthernet0/0
 no shutdown
!
ip route 0.0.0.0 0.0.0.0 10.34.0.3
!
end
